content: free pattern viewable here https //www sweetsofties com/2024/04/candy-fish html the candy fish is an easy no-sew amigurumi pattern that works up quickly this colorful crochet project can easily be customized to make a shorter fish goldfish a longer fish sardine or a fish with textured scales have fun with endless yarn color combinations they make quick gifts party favors or craft fair products they can also be turned into a cute crochet keychain or a cat toy by adding a bit of catnip inside the pdf pattern includes some photos to help guide you through the doll-making process **size** length 3 75 inches 9 5 cm **materials** medium weight 4 yarn in desired colors 2 25mm crochet hook 6mm plastic safety eyes stuffing yarn needle scissors **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below changing colors and attaching yarn **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together flo = front loops only optional drop stitch *copyright notice this pattern is © 2024 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern in any way my patterns may not be used in video tutorials or for teaching classes both online and in-person you may link to this pattern but you may not copy any part of the pattern instructions on other websites you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer
